summary: LandingHeader.tsx was updated to reduce the header min-height and logo height by ~20% at base and md breakpoints, matching the primary sizing requirement. However, the diff also includes unrelated metadata/documentation changes (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) that were not requested, violating the constraint to keep the change limited to header sizing.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced broad project and component summary content describing unrelated features (e.g., header color tokens, FeaturesSection CTA, Contact/ScheduleConsultation details) despite the request being limited to header sizing only.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to header sizing and lists non-goals such as not changing unrelated sections. The diff shows modifications to a summary file containing descriptions of many unrelated features.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified project state tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) marking the request(s) as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any changes to project tracking/state files; this is extra scope beyond reducing the LandingHeader height.
